medicareandmore.title: Medicare & More Insurance Agency
medicareandmore.description: Built this website from scratch using React to replace my mom's VistaPrint website, which was costing her $35/month.
features: $12/yr custom domain she can manage on Google Domains
Custom Google Maps marker for her business, shown on the Contact page using React Google Maps (currently feature-toggled off)

rubycalculator.title: Ruby Calculator
rubycalculator.description: I made this calculator to practice using Ruby and writing unit tests in RSpec
features: Does + - / * as well as modulo and exponentiation
Each operation has its own method on the Calculator class
RSpec tests are written for each method
